alert.note: Alert for Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 1:49PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Coconino and Yavapai Counties through 215 PM MST... At 149 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Munds Park, or 11 miles northeast of Sedona, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Munds Park, Cave Springs Campground, Sterling Fish Hatchery, Pine Flat Campground and West Fork Of Oak Creek. This includes the following highways... Interstate 17 between mile markers 322 and 332. State Route 89A between mile markers 383 and 394. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim
